S06n567:1: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-guṇā ime bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bhagavatā parikīrtitāḥ |
S06n567:3: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-bahūni subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarmāṇyantarāyakarāṇyutpasyante |
S06n567:5: bhagavānāha-teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ cireṇa pratibhānamutpatsyate |
S06n567:25: na vayamatra gādhaṃ nāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ityutthāyāsanātprakramiṣyanti |
S06n567:29: na no'tra grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nāmadheyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yatra no janma,
S06n567:30: na no'tra nāma gotraṃ vā gṛhītam,
S06n567:36: tairyāvadbhiścittotpādaistathā tathā tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsārasya punaḥ punaḥ parigrahīṣyanti,
S06n567:38: tatkasmāt? imāṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāmaśṛṇvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu na nirjāyante |
S06n567:40: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya ye te sūtrāntā naiva sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāstān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante |
S06n567:42: yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte na laukikalokottareṣu śikṣitukāmā na laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu niryātukāmā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣante |
S06n567:44: evaṃ te parīttabuddhayo laukikalokottarāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñāyā mūlaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya praśākhāmadhyālambitavyāṃ maṃsyante |
S06n567:45: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kukkuraḥ svāmino'ntikātpiṇḍāṃśchorayitvā karmakarasyāntikātkavalaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta,
S06n567:48: ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasya mūlaṃ chorayitvā śākhāpatrapalālabhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne sāraṃ vṛddhatvaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante |
S06n567:51: na hi te'lpabuddhayo jñāsyanti-prajñāpāramitā āhārikā sarvajñajñānasyeti |
S06n567:52: te prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya chorayitvā tato'nye sūtrāntā ye śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
S06n567:57: na hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante |
S06n567:58: kathaṃ ca subhūte śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante?
S06n567:63: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam |
S06n567:64: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam-ātmānaṃ ca tathatāyāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi sarvalokānugrahāya,
S06n567:69: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo hastinamapaśyan hastino varṇasaṃsthāne paryeṣeta |
S06n567:70: so'ndhakāre hastinaṃ labdhvā yena prakāśaṃ tenopanidhyāyeta |
S06n567:73: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ purūṣo bhavet?
S06n567:75: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
S06n567:76: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā aparipṛcchantastāṃ chorayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
S06n567:80: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ratnārthikaḥ puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā nāvagāheta,
S06n567:84: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ?
S06n567:86: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
S06n567:87: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvāpyanavagāhamānā avijānantastakṣyanti |
S06n567:95: dṛṣṭa eva dharme anupādāya āsravebhyaścittaṃ vimocya parinirvāpayāmiti |
S06n567:99: mahāyānasaṃprasthitā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhā bhavanti |
S06n567:102: lokapariṇāyakā hi bhavanti te satpuruṣā lokārthakarāḥ |
S06n567:104: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte aparipakvakuśalamūlāḥ parīttakubuddhikā mṛdukādhyāśayā bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06n567:105: te ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntānajānānā anavabuddhyamānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivandanti,
S06n567:107: idamapi subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo nirmātukāmaḥ syāt |
S06n567:111: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte vaijayantaprāsādapramāṇaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmena nirmātukāmena sūryācandramasorvimānātpramāṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati?
S06n567:113: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06n567:114: ye prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06n567:121: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te paṇḍitajātīyāḥ bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
S06n567:124: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rājānaṃ ca cakravartinaṃ bhraṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06n567:126: dṛṣṭvā ca īdṛśo rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ceti nimittaṃ gṛhītvā koṭṭarājaṃ paśyet |
S06n567:127: sa tasya koṭṭarājasya varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ teja ṛddhiṃ ca nimittaṃ ca gṛhītvā apratibalo viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ prati evaṃ vadet-īdṛśa eva sa rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ca nimittena ceti |
S06n567:128: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyo yaścakravartinaṃ koṭṭarājena samīkartavyaṃ manyeta?
S06n567:130: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06n567:131: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante |
S06n567:133: na khalu punarahaṃ subhūte ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntairbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ vadāmi |
S06n567:134: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yattathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmupāyakauśalyamākhyātam,
S06n567:135: tatrāśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na niryāsyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n567:138: tasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgata enāmanuśaṃsāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ paśyan anekaparyāyeṇa bodhisattvān mahāsattvānasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati saṃniveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati-evaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti |
S06n567:139: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvāḥ pratibhānti,
S06n567:140: ye avinivartanīyayānaṃ mahāyānamavāpya samāsādya punareva tadvivarjya vivartya hīnayānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante?
S06n567:142: bhagavānāha-tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bubhukṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ labdhvā hitavipākaṃ sukhavipākaṃ yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ kṣutpipāsānivartakam,
S06n567:144: ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ labdhvā śatarasaṃ bhojanamutsṛjya vivarjya taṃ ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta |
S06n567:145: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet?
S06n567:148: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñciṣyanti,
S06n567:151: prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkṛtya tataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante |
S06n567:154: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
S06n567:157: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo'nardhyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ labdhvā alpārdhyeṇa alpasāreṇa maṇiratnena sārdhaṃ samīkartavyaṃ manyeta |
S06n567:158: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ?
S06n567:160: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06n567:161: ya idaṃ gambhīraṃ prabhāsvaraṃ prajñāpāramitāratnaṃ labdhvā śrutvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena samīkartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06n567:162: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau ca sarvajñatāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante |
S06n567:163: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
S06n567:165: bhagavānāha-idamapi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:166: punaraparaṃ subhūte asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāsyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyāmapi bahūni pratibhānānyutpatsyante,
S06n567:168: idamapi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:169: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā likhitum?
S06n567:171: ye kecitsubhūte prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarairlikhitvā prajñāpāramitā likhiteti maṃsyante,
S06n567:175: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ deśamanasikārā utpatsyante,
S06n567:197: śayanāsanamanasikārā jīvitamanasikārā itikartavyatāmanasikārā rāgamanasikārā dveṣamanasikārā mohamanasikārā ṛtumanasikārā sukālamanasikārā duṣkālamanasikārā gītamanasikārā vādyamanasikārā nṛtyamanasikārā kāvyanāṭaketihāsamanasikārāḥ śāstramanasikārā vyavahāramanasikārā hāsyamanasikārā lāsyamanasikārāḥ śokamanasikārā āyāsamanasikārā ātmamanasikārāḥ,
S06n567:198: ityetāṃścānyāṃśca subhūte manasikārān māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃhariṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyāmantarāyaṃ kariṣyati,
S06n567:202: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante rājamanasikārāḥ kumāramanasikārāhastimanasikārā aśvamanasikārā rathamanasikārā gulmadarśanamanasikārāḥ |
S06n567:204: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante agnimanasikārā icchāmanasikārā dhanadhānyasamṛddhimanasikārāḥ |
S06n567:205: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:206: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmutpatsyante lābhasatkāracīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmantarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ lābhasatkāraślokasvādāścittotpīḍā vā |
S06n567:210: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ ye te gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktāḥ,
S06n567:211: tān māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣaṇopasaṃkramya upasaṃhariṣyati-iha śikṣasva,
S06n567:216: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upāyakuśalena tebhyaḥ spṛhotpādayitavyā |
S06n567:218: kiṃ cāpi subhūte teṣu sūtrānteṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāṣitāni,
S06n567:219: na khalu punarupāyakauśalyaṃ tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākhyātam |
S06n567:221: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitavyāṃ maṃsyante |
S06n567:222: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyukteṣu sūtrānteṣu upāyakauśalyaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante |
S06n567:223: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:225: dharmabhāṇakaśca kilāsī bhaviṣyati na dharmaṃ deśayitukāmaḥ |
S06n567:226: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:227: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaśca akilāsī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāṃ dātukāmaḥ,
S06n567:228: dhārmaśravaṇikaśca kilāsī vā bahukṛtyo vā bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:229: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:230: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśchandiko bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītukāmo dhārayitukāmo vācayitukāmaḥ paryavāptukāmaḥ pravartayitukāmo'ntaśo likhitukāmo'pi bhaviṣyati,
S06n567:232: dharmabhāṇakaścānyaddeśāntaraṃ kṣepsyate noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajñaḥ,
S06n567:234: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāmantaśaḥ likhyamānāyām |
S06n567:235: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:236: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaśca akilāsī bhaviṣyatyabhijño dātukāmo vācayitukāma imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
S06n567:237: dhārmaśravaṇikaśca deśāntaraṃ prasthito bhaviṣyati noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajño'nabhijño vā bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:238: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:239: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaśca āmiṣaguruko lābhasatkāracīvaraguruko bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:240: dhārmaśravaṇikāśca alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto'rthaṃ vā na dātukāmo bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:241: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ likhyamānāyām |
S06n567:242: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:243: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśca śrāddho bhaviṣyati imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmo'rthamavaboddhukāmo'rthaṃ dātukāmo'rthaṃ parityaktukāmaḥ |
S06n567:244: dharmabhāṇakaśca aśrāddho bhaviṣyati alpeccho vā na vā bhāṣitukāmaḥ |
S06n567:246: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśca śrāddho bhaviṣyati śrotukāmo'rthamavaboddhukāmaḥ |
S06n567:247: dharmabhāṇakasya ca tāni sūtrāṇi dharmāntarāyikatayā na saṃbhaviṣyanti nāvatariṣyanti |
S06n567:249: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāmantaśo likhatām |
S06n567:250: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:253: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitumantaśo likhitum |
S06n567:254: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:257: sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena samanvāgato na śrotukāmo bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:259: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam |
S06n567:262: sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena samanvāgato na bhāṣitukāmo bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:264: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati likhanāya vācanāya paryavāptaye vā |
S06n567:265: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:266: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ kaścideva tatrāgatya nirayāṇāmavarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06n567:275: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:276: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ vā kaścideva tatrāgatya devānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate-evaṃsukhitā devāḥ,
S06n567:281: tadapi ca sarvaṃ prajñatā vimṛśya sarvaiva duḥkhopapattiriti |
S06n567:282: uktaṃ hīdaṃ bhagavatā-acchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakamapyahaṃ bhikṣavo bhavābhinirvṛttiṃ na varṇayāmi |
S06n567:283: sarvaṃ hi saṃskṛtamanityaṃ sarvaṃ bhayāvagataṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ |
S06n567:284: tadevaṃ sarvamaśāśvatamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharmakaṃ viditvā paṇḍitairihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptavyam,
S06n567:287: mā no bhūyastābhiḥ saṃpattivipattibhirduḥkhabhūyiṣṭhābhiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhūditi |
S06n567:289: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:290: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye'pi te bhikṣavo dharmabhāṇakāḥ,
S06n567:297: evaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca arthikatayā chandikatayā dharmagauraveṇa taṃ dharmabhāṇakamanuvartsyanti,
S06n567:302: yena yena durbhikṣaśca ayogakṣemaśca jīvitāntarāyaśca bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:303: te ca dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ parebhyaḥ śroṣyanti-asau pradeśo durbhikṣaśca ayogakṣemaśca |
S06n567:305: sa ca dharmabhāṇakastān kulaputrānevamabhivyāhariṣyati-amuṣmin kulaputrāḥ pradeśe durbhikṣabhayam |
S06n567:306: kaccitkulaputrā yūyamāgamiṣyatha mā paścādvipratisāriṇo bhaviṣyatha durbhikṣabhayaṃ praviṣṭāḥ?
S06n567:307: evaṃ te tena dharmabhāṇakena sūkṣmeṇopāyena pratikṣepsyate |
S06n567:311: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyām |
S06n567:312: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:313: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako yena jantubhayaṃ yena vyālabhayaṃ yenāmanuṣyabhayaṃ tena saṃprasthito bhaviṣyati |
S06n567:314: sa tena caran viharan yena vyālakāntāraṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena prakramiṣyati |
S06n567:315: sa tān dhārmaśravaṇikānevaṃ vakṣyati-yatkhalu kulaputrā jānīdhvaṃ yasmin pradeśe jantubhayaṃ vyālabhayaṃ kravyādabhayaṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena vayaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ |
S06n567:321: ayamapi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāmantarāya utpatsyate uddiśyamānāyāḥ svādhyāyyamānāyāḥ yāvallikhyamānāyāḥ |
S06n567:322: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:325: sa tayā abhīkṣṇāvalokanatayā bahukṛtyatayā tān dhārmaśravaṇikān pratyākhyāsyati-asti tāvanme kiṃcidavalokayitavyam,
S06n567:327: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām |
S06n567:328: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:329: iti hi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃstaistaiḥ prakāraistathā tathā ceṣṭiṣyate,
S06n567:342: tāni sarvāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇīti boddhavyāni,
S06n567:344: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kimatra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yadiha māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate?
S06n567:346: yathemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na kaścidudgrahīṣyati na dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyati na pravartayiṣyati na deśayiṣyati nopadekṣyati noddekṣyati na svādhyāsyati na lekhayiṣyati na likhiṣyati?
S06n567:347: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā |
S06n567:350: prahīṇakleśānāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate |
S06n567:352: ataḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyāṃ mahatā saṃvegena mahāntamudyogamāpadyate |
S06n567:354: yathā na kaścidimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhedvā paryavāpnuyādveti ||
S06n567:355: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣepsyati |
S06n567:356: evaṃ ca navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrā vivecayiṣyanti naiṣā prajñāpāramitā yāmāyuṣmantaḥ śṛṇvanti |
S06n567:359: ityevaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān saṃśayaṃ prakṣepsyati |
S06n567:360: evaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣipya navayānasaṃprasthitān bodhisattvānalpabuddhikān mandabuddhikān parīttabuddhikānandhīkṛtānavyākṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃśayaṃ pātayiṣyati |
S06n567:361: te saṃśayaprāptā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahīṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na lekhayiṣyanti na likhiṣyanti |
S06n567:362: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:363: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣūnnirmāya buddhaveṣeṇāgatya evaṃ mārakarmopasaṃhariṣyati-yo bodhisattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06n567:367: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n567:368: evaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānevamādikāni subahūni anyānyapi mārakarmāṇyutpādayiṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām |
S06n567:381: evameva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prāyeṇa bahavo'ntarāyā utpatsyante |
S06n567:391: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ na deśayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyāmapi maṃsyante ||
S06n567:399: na ca teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati,
S06n567:401: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyāmapi maṃsyante ||
S06n567:404: atha ca subhūte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante dhārayitavyāṃ vācayitavyāṃ paryavāptavyāṃ pravartayitavyāmupadeṣṭavyāmuddeṣṭavyāṃ svādhyātavyāṃ lekhayitavyāmantaśo likhitavyāmapi maṃsyante,
S06n567:406: buddhaparigraheṇodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti lekhayiṣyantyantaśo likhiṣyantīti |
